en: Print tips of the day on startup
Allow "updating" to the same build as installed
Include archived mods when installing Kenan modpack
Number of results to download for the changelog:
Migrate the following files when updating:
Show a description for the chosen game under the Game list.
Print a random tip in the status pane when the launcher starts.
Allow starting the update procedure even when the selected release is the same as currently installed.
Shorten release names to just the date and number (e.g. "2021-09-08-1927" instead of "Cataclysm-DDA experimental build 2021-09-08-1927").
Show mods that come with the game but are marked as "obsolete". Normally, such mods are not considered as installed.
When installing Kenan modpack, also include *archived* mods. These mods are no longer maintained by Kenan and may be outdated.
Shows the Debug tab with some testing functions and enables debug messages in the status  pane (useful for troubleshooting).
How many latest releases will be requested from GitHub after starting the launcher, choosing the game or clicking Refresh.
How many recent pull requests (code additions) will be requested from GitHub to form the changelog. High numbers may lead to slow responses and failures.

Use this if the automatically inferred UI scale looks too large or too small on your system. (Automatic scale relies on system-reported display DPI, which may not work on all systems, or give inadequate results when the resolution is too low.)
Choose which types of game data to carry over into the new game version when updating.
